name: Sarah Johnson
text: Kumud delivered an exceptional full-stack application. The code quality and attention to detail were outstanding. Highly recommend!

name: Raj Patel
text: Our e-commerce site exceeded expectations. Fast, secure, and beautiful. Sales increased by 40% in the first month!

name: Emily Chen
text: The landing page converted 3x better than our previous one. Clean design and lightning-fast performance.

name: Michael Brown
text: Professional, responsive, and delivered on time. The WordPress site looks amazing and is easy to manage.

name: Priya Sharma
text: The AI chatbot integration transformed our customer support. Response time reduced by 70% and customers love it!

name: David Lee
text: Real-time features work flawlessly. The WebSocket implementation is solid and handles thousands of concurrent users.

name: Ananya Gupta
text: The PWA feels like a native app! Offline support and push notifications work perfectly. Users are impressed.

name: James Wilson
text: Custom dashboard with beautiful data visualizations. Makes complex data easy to understand at a glance.
